hero.title: Heal Your Heart, Transform Your Life
hero.subtitle: Specialist in Codependency and Childhood Wounds
hero.description: With over 35 years of experience, I guide you toward deep healing and self-love. Discover how to break toxic patterns and create healthy relationships.

items.title: Healing the Maternal Wound
items.description: A profound guide to heal the deepest wounds of our childhood and find inner peace.

items.title: Love or Codependency
items.description: Discover the difference between true love and codependent patterns that damage our relationships.

therapy.title: Individual Therapy
therapy.description: Personalized sessions to work on your specific wounds and codependency patterns.

workshops.title: Group Workshops
workshops.description: Experience healing in community with others who share your journey.

items.name: María González
items.text: Aura helped me understand patterns I had been repeating for years. Her approach is deep and healing.

items.name: Carmen Rodríguez
items.text: After working with Aura, I was finally able to establish healthy boundaries in my relationships.

items.name: Ana López
items.text: Her books and therapy gave me the tools I needed to heal my inner child.

footer.description: Psychotherapist specialized in codependency and childhood wounds.
footer.copyright: © 2025 Aura María Medina de Wit. All rights reserved.

blog.title: Latest Insights & Thoughts
blog.subtitle: Explore articles on healing, personal growth, and therapeutic insights to support your journey toward emotional well-being.

posts.title: Healing from Codependency: A Journey to Self-Discovery
posts.excerpt: Understanding the patterns of codependency and how to break free from unhealthy relationship dynamics.

posts.title: Inner Child Work: Reconnecting with Your Authentic Self
posts.excerpt: Exploring how childhood wounds shape our adult relationships and the path to healing through inner child work.

posts.title: The Power of Transpersonal Therapy in Modern Healing
posts.excerpt: Integrating spiritual and psychological approaches for deeper transformation and personal growth.

posts.title: Building Healthy Boundaries in Relationships
posts.excerpt: Learn practical strategies for setting and maintaining boundaries that support your emotional well-being.

posts.title: Mindfulness Practices for Emotional Regulation
posts.excerpt: Simple yet powerful mindfulness techniques to help manage overwhelming emotions and find inner peace.

posts.title: Understanding Attachment Styles and Their Impact
posts.excerpt: How your early attachment experiences influence your adult relationships and strategies for healing.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to begin your journey toward healing and personal growth? I'm here to support you every step of the way.
